greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Bisection of A000360.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8192
mathematica: a[n_] := a[n] = Which[n == 0, 1, EvenQ@ n, a[n/2] + a[n/2 - 1], True, a[(n - 1)/2] - Mod[(n - 1)/2 - 1, 3] + 1]; Table[a[2 n], {n, 0, 97}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Apr 05 2017, after _Jean-François Alcover_ at A000360 *)
program: (define (A284565 n) (A000360with_prep_0 (+ n n 1))) ;; See code in A284556.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 05 2017
